examples.transcript_chunk: Cancer screenings, surgeries needed to be rescheduled. It was difficult to get care for certain individuals who were having heart attacks because there were so much pressure on the emergency 9 1 1 dispatch system. Even my, and within my hospital, we had to dedicate a new ward specifically for patients with lung issues, mostly related to COVID-19.
examples.claim: During the first wave of COVID-19, hospitals and emergency rooms were overwhelmed, elective care was rescheduled, and there was pressure on the dispatch system.
examples.notes: Factual, specific description of COVID-19 impact on healthcare

examples.transcript_chunk: And agriculture also has all these other problems, right? It's, it uses 70% of our fresh water. It's the leading driver of water pollution and deforestation and wetlands, drainage.
examples.claim: Agriculture uses 70% of the world's fresh water.

examples.transcript_chunk: DeFi is revolutionary, man. It's changing everything. Like, this is the future of finance. Everyone's talking about it.
examples.notes: Generic opinion without specific facts, metrics, or concrete examples

examples.transcript_chunk: It became left verse right, which then ended up flipping, interestingly enough, because when the pandemic first started and the vaccine was being developed, this was operation warp speed headed by President Trump. Then we saw a few years later, as mandates were being forced perhaps where they didn't need to be, where recommendations were being made about boosters that weren't a hundred percent accurate. We started seeing a flipping of the left and right parties.
examples.claim: President Trump headed Operation Warp Speed
examples.notes: Clear factual statement - names the person and the program

examples.transcript_chunk: NFTs are interesting. Some people think they're the future of art and digital ownership. Others think it's all a fad. Time will tell.
examples.notes: Completely vague - 'interesting' is subjective and provides no factual information

examples.transcript_chunk: It has, as we stated in the article, about a $40 billion budget, which is 1% of, of the federal budget. And it does a lot of great work when people like Mr. Musk say, Hey, we've gotta feed it into the wood chipper and get rid of it. What they're talking about is aid and assistance and democracy building and disease prevention and infrastructure creation in all of the nations where U-S-A-I-D is located.
examples.claim: USAID has a $40 billion budget, which is 1% of the federal budget

examples.transcript_chunk: Layer 2 solutions are important for scaling Ethereum. They help reduce gas fees and make transactions faster. Everyone's building on Layer 2 now.
examples.notes: Generic statement - no specific solutions named, no metrics provided

examples.transcript_chunk: Bitcoin's price is volatile. It goes up and down all the time. That's just how crypto works.
examples.notes: Generic truism - no specific volatility metrics, timeframes, or data

examples.transcript_chunk: So, you know, he, he had this, he had this charge and he had actually come, he's been in the US for 12 years. He had come in 2013, he had applied for asylum. It was denied, but they sort of let him out to do these yearly ice check-ins.
examples.claim: He applied for asylum, which was denied

examples.transcript_chunk: And there was a mantra that was born about at that time from our channel called Stay Alert, not anxious. Because I saw even for myself, how easy it is to become anxious given the fact that we have this new virus, it's spreading so rapidly, there's information that's spreading rapidly that could be true or untrue. Everyone was confused.
examples.claim: There was a mantra called 'Stay Alert, not anxious' during the pandemic.
examples.notes: Vague, useless claim - unclear significance and which channel/organization created it

examples.transcript_chunk: Quince has closet staples you'll want to reach for over and over like cozy, cashmere and cotton sweaters for just under $50. Breathable, flow knit polos and comfortable lightweight pants that somehow work for both Weekend hangs and dressed up dinners. Best part, everything with Quince is half the cost of similar brands by working directly with top artisans and cutting out the middleman.
examples.claim: Quince offers high-quality basics for a fraction of the cost compared to similar brands
examples.notes: This is an ad - commercial content, not factual claim worthy of extraction

examples.transcript_chunk: Bitcoin has been around for over a decade now. It's really important in the financial world. Everyone should understand how important Bitcoin is to the future of finance.
examples.notes: Vague value judgment - no specific facts, metrics, or concrete information

examples.transcript_chunk: You should do your own research before investing in crypto. Never invest more than you can afford to lose. This is not financial advice.
examples.claim: You should do your own research
examples.notes: Generic advice, not a factual claim - common disclaimer language

examples.transcript_chunk: Goldman Sachs looking stock today is trading all the time high. They're considered the, you know, world's leading thought leaders in investment space. I mean, I think that's a weird flex to make in the first place.
examples.claim: Goldman Sachs is considered the world's leading thought leader in investment space.
examples.notes: Factual claim about Goldman Sachs reputation
